concept.label: Beer in Belgium
concept.definition: Beer in Belgium (http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q348229): A product of fermentation characterized by its origin from Belgium. Often known as Belgian beer, it represents a broad collection of ales, lagers, and other beer types produced within the country.
